name: EMPORIUM
description: Emporium is a short interactive vignette. Exploring notions of escapism, loss and a fragmented sense of self in the wake of a personal tragedy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 processor or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 645 OEM or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Not Recommended for Intel integrated graphics cards.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 processor or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
